name: Hypoxia
description:
You are an astronaut who needs to survive in a distant and cold space.
Build a base, collect resources, explore space. Fight with aliens.

Hypoxia is a sci-fi space ship sim driven by an intelligent AI storyteller.

  • Manage astronauts' moods, needs, wounds, illnesses and addictions.

  • Fight aliens, space animals, giant insects and aliens space ships.

  • Craft structures, weapons, and apparel from asteroids.

  • Trade with passing space ships and colonies.

  • Discover a new generated world each time you play.
